name: OceanBLUE Yachts
tag_list: yacht, charter, boat, cruise, crewed, gulet, bareboat, skippered, sailboat, catamaran, cruising, rental
overview: OceanBLUE Yachts Ltd. prides itself on a reputation for offering high quality luxury motor yachts, sailing yachts & superyachts, all with first class experienced captain & crew, as well as quality, Bareboat, or Skippered only Sailboats, yachts and Motorboats, for charter from and to destinations throughout the Mediterranean & Adriatic. Be it the Cote D’azure France, Monaco, Croatia, Italy, Sicily, Sardinia, Mallorca, Corsica, Greece or Turkey, rest assured with our extensive network of trusted yacht mangers & owners we will be able to offer the very best yachts, together with a highly recomended professional crew to suit your exact requirements. We are members of the MARINE LEISURE ASSOCIATION and BRITISH MARINE FEDERATION, and as such adhere to their strict guidelines and standards.
